title: What are the Techniques and Exercises for Hypnotherapy and Self-Hypnosis?
first_phrase: In the last 200 tokens of the text, the focus shifts to exploring different techniques and exercises that can be used in hypnotherapy, self-hypnosis, and weight loss. The section also touches on the concept of Hermeticism and quantum physics, the Enneagram, and symbolisms. Prior to this section, the text covers different types of personalities, the importance of understanding an individual's preferences, and the mirror exercise of de-identification, among other topics. The last 200 tokens delve deeper into some of the techniques and exercises mentioned in the previous section. One interesting exercise involves "putting a desire in water" and creating movement in the person. Additionally, the text covers the topic of clairvoyance.

last_phrase: In order to overcome our fears and achieve our desires, we need to let go of the masks that are holding us back. This requires a commitment to self-improvement and regular practice through exercises such as self-hypnosis, clairvoyance, and Indian self-hypnosis. By increasing our sensitivity and accessing our inner sense, we can connect with the universe and realize our deepest desires. Through these practices, we can break free from fear and achieve a more fulfilling life. So, let's commit to regular practice and let these masks fall away.
